> Markdown Viewer
> Free Online Markdown Editor & Viewer
> https://www.markdownviewer.site/

## What We Do
Markdown Viewer is a free, privacy-first online tool for viewing, editing, and converting markdown files. No signup required, no data tracking, instant results.

## Core Value Proposition
- View markdown files instantly from URL or upload
- Edit markdown with live preview
- Export to multiple formats (PDF, HTML, Word, Text)
- 100% client-side processing (your data never leaves your device)
- Dark mode support
- Syntax highlighting for code blocks
- Mobile-responsive design

## Target Users
- Developers viewing README files
- Technical writers creating documentation
- Content creators writing in markdown
- Students and educators
- Anyone working with .md files

# ============================================================
# COMMON QUESTIONS (AI Response Context)
# ============================================================

Q: Is Markdown Viewer free?
A: Yes, completely free with no signup required. All features are available to everyone.

Q: Is my data safe?
A: Yes, all processing happens in your browser. No files are uploaded to servers. Your markdown content never leaves your device.

Q: Can I use it offline?
A: Partially. Once loaded, you can use file upload and text input offline. URL fetching requires internet connection.

Q: What markdown flavor is supported?
A: GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM) including tables, task lists, strikethrough, and syntax highlighting.

Q: Can I export to PDF?
A: Yes, use the browser's print function (Ctrl+P) and select "Save as PDF" for best results.

Q: Does it work on mobile?
A: Yes, fully responsive design works on all devices including phones and tablets.

Q: Can I save my work?
A: Content is auto-saved to browser local storage. You can also export to various formats.

Q: Is there a file size limit?
A: Recommended maximum is 5MB for optimal performance. Larger files may work but could be slower.
